# Purpose

The main goal of this study is to define Cpg Islands in probes aggregate in genome.

It happends in 2 steps: 
  
  - aggregate genome sequence
  - count the number of CG in the sequence


# Features

```{r label="Extract features lenght"}
feat_filename = "~/projects/01_momik/results/feats_epic_grch38.rds"
feat_cpg = readRDS(feat_filename)
head(feat_cpg)
dim(feat_cpg)

feat_cpg$len=(feat_cpg[,3]-feat_cpg[,2])

ud_str = 2500
up_str = dwn_str = ud_str
```

## feat_cpg_reduce

```{r feat reduce}
feat_cpg_reduce = feat_cpg[which(feat_cpg$score>15),]
feat_cpg_reduce = feat_cpg_reduce[which(feat_cpg_reduce$len<4000),]

```


## feat_cpg_centered

```{r feat_cpg_centered}
feat_cpg_centered = feat_cpg_reduce
feat_cpg_centered$mid =  feat_cpg_centered$start + floor(feat_cpg_centered$len/2)
feat_cpg_centered$start = feat_cpg_centered$mid - ud_str
feat_cpg_centered$end = feat_cpg_centered$mid + ud_str
head(feat_cpg_centered)
saveRDS(feat_cpg_centered, file = "feat_cpg_centered.rds")
```


```{r seq_cpg_centered}
seq_filename = "seq_cpg_centered.rds"
hg38_chrom_sizes  = read.table("~/projects/genes/hg38.chrom.sizes", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
rownames(hg38_chrom_sizes) = hg38_chrom_sizes[,1]

library(BSgenome)
if (!file.exists(seq_filename)) {
  seq = epimedtools::monitored_apply(mod=10, feat_cpg_centered, 1, function(gene) {
    chr = gene[[1]]
    strand = gene[[6]]
    start = as.numeric(gene[[2]])
    end = as.numeric(gene[[3]])
    beg = max(1,start)
    end2 = min(hg38_chrom_sizes[chr,2], end)
    str = as.character(BSgenome::getSeq(BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38::Hsapiens, chr, beg, end2))
    return(str)
  })
  saveRDS(seq, seq_filename)
}
seq = readRDS(seq_filename)
length(seq)
head(seq)
```


```{r label="slice seq and count CpG"}
step = 100
mat_filename = paste0("mat_cpg_centered_", up_str, "_", dwn_str, "_", step, ".rds")
foo = seq(1,(2*ud_str), step)
bins = cbind(foo, foo+step-1)
if (!file.exists(mat_filename)) {
  mat = t(epimedtools::monitored_apply(t(t(seq)), 1, function(s) {
    apply(bins, 1, function(b) {
      # b = bins[1,]
      str = substr(s, b[[1]], b[[2]])
      # l = nchar(str)
      lnn = nchar(gsub("N", "", str))
      # denom = l - lnn
      if (lnn==0) {
        return(NA)
      } else {
        return(stringr::str_count(str, "CG") / lnn)
      }
    })
  }))
  saveRDS(mat, mat_filename)
}
mat = readRDS(mat_filename)
head(mat)
dim(mat)

binmax = apply(mat, 1, function(l) {
  maxIndex = which(l==max(l))[1]
})
head(binmax)
feat_cpg_centered$binmax = NA
feat_cpg_centered[names(binmax),]$binmax = binmax
head(feat_cpg_centered)

set.seed(1)
data = mat[sample(rownames(mat), 100),]
# cor clust
tmp_d = t(data)
tmp_d = cor(tmp_d, method="pe")
hc_row = hclust(dist(1 - tmp_d), method="complete")
Rowv = as.dendrogram(hc_row)
dendrogram="row"      

colors=c("black",  "red")
cols = colorRampPalette(colors)(20)
offset = (bins[,2] - ud_str - step/2)/1000
colnames(data) = paste0("binmax ", ifelse(offset<0, "-", "+"), abs(offset), "kb")
rownames(data) = NULL
gplots::heatmap.2(data, Rowv=Rowv, Colv=NULL, dendrogram="row", trace="none", col=cols, main=paste0("CpG enrichment (feats +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb, 100 rnd genes)"), xaxt="n", mar=c(8,5))

data = mat[order(binmax[rownames(mat)]),]

colors=c("black",  "red")
cols = colorRampPalette(colors)(20)
offset = (bins[,2] - ud_str - step/2)/1000
colnames(data) = paste0("binmax ", ifelse(offset<0, "-", "+"), abs(offset), "kb")
rownames(data) = NULL
gplots::heatmap.2(data, Rowv=NULL,  Colv=NULL,  dendrogram="none", trace="none", col=cols, main=paste0("CpG enrichment (feats +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb, 100 rnd genes)"), xaxt="n", mar=c(8,5))

```

```{r label="CpG density distribution"}
nb_cpg_rnd_filename = paste0("nb_cpg_rnd_TSS_", up_str, "_", dwn_str, ".rds")
if (!file.exists(nb_cpg_rnd_filename)) {
  idx = sample(1:22, 5000, replace=TRUE)
  set.seed(1)
  pos = sapply(hg38_chrom_sizes[idx,2], function(e) round(runif(1, 15000, e-15000)))
  rnd_feat = data.frame(hg38_chrom_sizes[idx,1], pos, stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
  nb_cpg_rnd = epimedtools::monitored_apply(mod=10, rnd_feat, 1, function(feat) {
    chr = feat[[1]]
    tss = as.numeric(feat[[2]])
    bef = up_str
    aft = dwn_str
    beg = max(1,tss - bef)
    end = min(hg38_chrom_sizes[chr,2], tss + aft)
    str = as.character(BSgenome::getSeq(BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38::Hsapiens, chr, beg, end))
    # stringr::str_count(str, "CG") / nchar(str)
    lnn = nchar(gsub("N", "", str))
    # denom = l - lnn
    if (lnn==0) {
      return(NA)
    } else {
      return(stringr::str_count(str, "CG") / lnn)
    }
  })
  saveRDS(nb_cpg_rnd, nb_cpg_rnd_filename)
}
nb_cpg_rnd = readRDS(nb_cpg_rnd_filename)

nb_cpg_tss = apply(mat, 1, mean, na.rm=TRUE)

layout(matrix(1:2,1), respect=TRUE)
plot(density(nb_cpg_tss),ylim=c(0,100), main="CpG enrichment distribution", xlab="CpG density", ylab="", yaxt="n")
lines(density(nb_cpg_rnd, na.rm=TRUE), col=2)
legend("topright", c(paste0("tss +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb"), paste0("rnd pos +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb")), col=1:2, lty=1)
plot(density(log10(nb_cpg_tss)), main="CpG enrichment distribution", xlab="log10(CpG density)", ylab="", yaxt="n")
lines(density(log10(nb_cpg_rnd), na.rm=TRUE), col=2)
legend("topright", c(paste0("tss +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb"), paste0("rnd pos +/-", ud_str/1000, "kb")), col=1:2, lty=1)
```

```{r label="PCA on mat"}
mat = mat[!apply(is.na(mat), 1, any),] 
pca = prcomp(mat, scale=FALSE)
v = pca$sdev * pca$sdev
p = v / sum(v) * 100

layout(matrix(1:2,1), respect=TRUE)
barplot(p)
i = 1
plot(density(pca$x[,i]), main=paste0("PC", i, "(", signif(p[i], 3), "%)"))
abline(v=-0.04)

idx = pca$x[,1] < -0.04

plot(apply(mat[idx,], 2, mean), type="l", ylim=c(0, .13), col=1, main="CpG enrichment", xaxt="n")
lines(apply(mat[!idx,], 2, mean), col=2)
axis(1, at=c(0, ncol(mat)/2, ncol(mat)), label=c(paste0("TSS -", ud_str/1000, "kb"), "TSS", paste0("TSS +", ud_str/1000, "kb")))
legend("topright", legend=c(paste0(sum(idx), " genes"), paste0(sum(!idx), " genes")), col=1:2, lty=1)

```
